caption.p: Bioadhesion parameter (normalized work of adhesion [ΔAUC/AUC]) of all the nanosystem suspensions and nanosystem suspensions containing 5% w/w pullulan (pull) (mean value ± SD; n=6).
Abbreviations: SLN, solid lipid nanoparticles; NLC, nanostructured lipid carriers; e, eucalyptus oil; r, rosemary oil; o, olive oil; s, sesame oil.
